high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class TypeSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.TypeSystem

  • public final class TypeSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class is the type-system in use by a compiler.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TypeSystemUtils utils
      This object provides utility methods related to the type-system.

      This method determines whether a type is a subtype of a type represented b a class.

      This method gets the type-factory that is used to create and access types.

    • Method Detail

      • typefactory

        public TypeFactory typefactory()
        This method gets the type-factory that is used to create and access types.

      • isSubtypeOf

        public boolean isSubtypeOf(IType instance,
                  java.lang.Class supertype)
        This method determines whether a type is a subtype of a type represented b a class.
        Parameters:
        instance - is the possible subtype.
        supertype - is the possible supertype.
        Returns:
        true, iff the instance is really a subtype of the supertype.
